Package collectionWorker

Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddCommand, AddIfMaxCommand, AddXmlCommand, ClearCommand, ClearHistoryCommand, ExecuteCommand, ExitCommand, FileNaming, FilterByNameCommand, HelpCommand, InfoCommand, ParseXmlCommand, PrintMpaaCommand, RemoveByIdCommand, RemoveLowerCommand, SaveCommand, SaveToHistoryCommand, ShowCommand, ShowHistoryCommand, UpdateCommand, UserInputHandler, Worker
public interface Command
The Command interface represents a command that can be executed by the application.
